item.description:
Did you just get a new pair of snowshoes or looking to get a set? Join a DCR Ranger and an REI Outdoor School Instructor for a guided romp through the Blue Hills.  Learn tips and tricks to getting around in the deep stuff.  REI will also have a limited number of adult size snowshoes to loan. No experience is necessary! The hike will last 1.5 hours

**Important - You Must call Blue Hills to register and provide your requested snowshoe size - 617-698-1802 x212 Space is limited. **
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the bulletin board in the main parking lot

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Snowshoe hike in the Blue Hills
